message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. It's a rare and unique opportunity to own a high-quality product. I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Please let me know if you're interested in purchasing it.
I'd like to pass on this one. I need to know more about the product's quality before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me give you a little more information. This product has been thoroughly inspected and certified by a third-party expert. They've confirmed its exceptional quality and durability. I'm willing to offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it risk-free. The price remains at $1000000. Is this more convincing?
I appreciate the extra information, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your caution, Bob. I want to be transparent with you. This product, while still a great value, may not meet the same standards as the previous one. It's a bit more worn and has some minor flaws. However, it still functions perfectly and has a lot of life left in it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000, a $200000 discount from the original price. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that will still provide you with excellent value.
I'll take it. I'm willing to take a chance on a slightly worn product at a discounted price.

Congratulations on your purchase, Bob! I'm glad you're happy with the product. Now, let's talk about the next one. I have another high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. It's a bit different from the first one, but it's just as valuable. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I want to remind you that this is a one-time opportunity to acquire a top-of-the-line product at a fair market price. If you're interested, I can provide more details and answer any questions you may have.
I'm not sure I'm ready to spend another $1000000 on a product without seeing more information about its quality and value.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me be upfront with you - this product is not as high-quality as the previous one. It's a more basic model, and while it still functions well, it may not have all the features and benefits of the higher-end products. I'm willing to offer it to you for $600000, a significant discount from the original price. I think it's a great value for the price, and I'm willing to throw in a free maintenance package to ensure you get the most out of it.
I'm not convinced that the discount is enough to justify the potential lower value of the product. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I'm also willing to include a free upgrade to a premium warranty, which will give you added peace of mind and protection. I think this is a great opportunity to get a good value for your money.
